item.description:
March of Dimes protests - Connecticut - April 30 & May 1

We will try to cover as many locations as possible.

Very simple & quick - we will place flyers on the cars and pass
out flyers & display posters for walk participants to view if
possible.

Please help - WE NEED YOUR PARTICIPATION!

Informing the walk participants about the UGLY TRUTH that the
March of Dimes hides can help tremendously - getting the word
out to their supporters is a great way to make a difference in
helping end the needless suffering of animals in their labs.

RSVP here 
https://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=213786615302730
or via email -  true.vegan@gmail.com
Please be sure to include which day(s) & location(s) you can
cover & your contact info (Cell # if possible so we can find
each other)

thank you!!

----- Saturday, April 30 ~

Central CT: Walnut Hill Park, New Britain

Fairfield: Jennings Beach

Mystic/Groton: Bluff Point State Park



---- Sunday, May 1 ~

Candlewood Region: City Center Green, Danbury

Hartford: Rentschler Field, East Hartford

Middletown: Vinal Technical High School

New Haven: Lighthouse Point Park

Quassy: Quassy Amusement Park, Middlebury

Stamford: Columbus Park


Registration for all events starts at 9 a.m. and the walks
start at 10 a.m.

--- FACTS about the March of Dimes cruel & unecessary
experiments

http://www.pcrm.org/resch/charities/mod/

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group
